Nashua.Tyngsborough High School:
Tyngsborough High School (THS) is located at 36 Norris Road in Tyngsborough, Middlesex County, Massachusetts, United States.
Tyngsborough High School has approximately 520 students, and is part of the Tyngsborough school district.


== History ==
The building currently used as Tyngsborough Middle School had been used as the high school until 1988.
